snippet.title: The Rise & Rule of Ancient Empires - Single Play
snippet.description:
Hello everyone!

Today I bring you a game that I stumbled upon really, didn't know about this game until I saw it one day on Ebay. This is The Rise & Rule of Ancient Empires, Sierra On-line's take on Civilization-like games.

First I must say that I'm not good at these games, so I decided to show it as a Single Play only, play it for a while just to show the initial functions of the game. I have no plan to do any Let's Play or other lengthy videos of this game, not until I get better at it and would have some good strategy to show.

I hope you'll enjoy anyways and that I may have sparked some interest in this game, I have enjoyed playing it for some time now.

Thanks for watching.
